snippet: Companies offering in-air Wi-Fi say they are trying out ways to speed things up and broaden the service’s availability.
abstract: Companies offering in-air Wi-Fi say they are trying out ways to speed things up and broaden the service’s availability; one plan would offer one aircraft channel for the Internet and another for watching live TV.
lead_paragraph: Companies offering in-air Wi-Fi say they are trying out ways to speed things up and broaden the service’s availability.

headline.main: Aiming for Seamless Surfing and Streaming at 30,000 Feet
headline.print_headline: Aiming for Seamless Surfing and Streaming at 30,000 Feet
